products.title: Basix Blackout Shale Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This medium grey 127mm vertical blind, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a grey blind instantly revitalises tired-looking window.
